name: Pizza Dough
steps: Mix Warm Water, Sugar, and Yeast in a big bowl
If there's no foaming, the yeast is dead and you need to start over
Mix in Salt and 2 Tablespoonds Olive Oil, then Flour
Knead the dough, only adding minimal extra flour when necessary
Stop kneading when dough can stretch thin without tearing (~15min)
Divide the dough into 4 equal balls
Lightly coat 4 glass tupperware containers with Olive Oil
Lightly coat the dough balls with Olive Oil
Put the dough balls into the containers
Leave the dough balls containers in fridge for 72-120 hours
comments: The cold ferment makes it taste super yummy. Not necessary, but highly recommended.
If you have a stand mixer, use it. Very helpful with such a wet dough.
